leve.name: The Bitter, the Better
leve.description: Dravanians have no love for the bitterdrake root, which curiously does not disagree with men's palates. Even curiouser is the bane of the dragonkind is the very same root used for a refreshing herbal tea that eases the stress of gravidity. Master Martineau has taken the last of our stock and the noblewomen of Ishgard would be grateful to the botanist who can provide the infirmary with more.
leve.client: Temple Knights Second Commander Ser Handeloup
